entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:58 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 07:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
